info.title: astro-engine
info.description: Swiss Ephemeris HTTP microservice for natal, progressed, and transit chart calculations.

post.description: Returns planetary positions, house cusps, angles, and aspects for a birth date/time/location.
Returns progressed planetary positions using secondary progression (1 day = 1 year).
Returns planetary positions and house cusps for a given date/time/location.
Returns natal, secondary progressed, and transit charts in a single call, with optional cross-chart aspects.
